column4: could anyone please help with a tftp install (removal) error? http://pastebin.com/cCZZQ1dG

it works for me. a quick and dirty (and possibly damaging) solution would be to put "exit 0" on the second line of the file /var/lib/dpkg/info/tftpd-hpa.postrm - a better solution would be running the commands in that file manually, and seeing what goes wrong.
